NAME: restoreinvites
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to restore the invitations after a reinitialization of these.
CONFIRM_ALL: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to restore invitations for all server members. Click the confirm button to confirm.
CONFIRM_MEMBER: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to restore the invitations of the mentioned member (s). Click the confirm button to confirm.
SUCCESS_ALL: All members' invitations have been successfully restored.
SUCCESS_MEMBER: The invitations of the mentioned member (s) have been successfully restored.
OPTION_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: The member you want to restore invites for.
